item.title: Secrets Management Best Practices
item.description: Security by Design Never Share Secrets Between Stages Rotate Secrets Frequently Automate Key Rotation Audit Trails Encrypted at Rest TLS Everywhere MFA Everywhere Password-based security is not sufficient. Too many passwords have been compromised over the years and aggregated as part of massive rainbow tables which make password cracking much more effective.
